description: Learned borrowing from Ancient Greek προπερισπώμενον (properispṓmenon).

entries.meaning: (linguistics, of a word) In Greek grammar, having a circumflex accent on the penultimate syllable.
examples: Coordinate terms: perispomenon, oxytone, paroxytone, proparoxytone, barytone

entries.meaning: (linguistics) A word having such an accent.
examples: Coordinate terms: perispomenon, oxytone, paroxytone, proparoxytone, barytone
